"Mech like Sparzyle... Isn't that thing: "They suddenly charged up to me, and then started blowing themselves up one after the other! That's just wrong, dude!"
"I guess it makes things easier 'cause they kill themselves, but..."
"Anyway, I'm counting on you! I'll be checking the whole thing out on the monitor, and with a big ol' smile on my face! Go get 'em!"
